text: Ezɨ atrivim kamaghɨn Abisai mɨgei, “Apsalom osɨmtɨzir ekiam e ganɨngi, ezɨ datɨrɨghɨn Bikrin otarim Seba, osɨmtɨzir bar ekiam e danɨngam, eghtɨ Seban osɨmtɨzim bar ekevegh Apsalomɨn osɨmtɨzim gafiragham. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, nɨ nan mɨdorozir gumaziba inigh mangɨ an agɨragh an suiragh. Puvatɨghtɨ Seba uan adarazi ko mangɨ nguibar ekiar dɨvazir gavgaviba itibar ikɨtɨ, e an suighan iburagham.”20:6 Hibrun akam deragha vezɨn kamɨn mɨngarim abɨghizir puvatɨ.
